main event: A reddish orange object shaped like two triangles toward each other was seen flying on a straight course in Knoxville, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object was observed for three minutes,The object appeared to be flying southeast and then diminished southwest,The sighting was conducted by a civilian observer,The report included a conclusion that the sighting was probably a guided missile,The observation occurred on August 13, 1957.
sighted object: one reddish orange object shaped like two triangles
